example.ex: I asked if I could go to the loo.

means: local optical oscillator 本地光振荡器

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1940s: many theories have been put forward about the word's origin: one suggests the source is Waterloo, a trade name for iron cisterns in the early part of the century; the evidence remains inconclusive
late 17th cent.: abbreviation of obsolete lanterloo from French lanturlu, a meaningless song refrain

means: local optical oscillator 本地光振荡器

sentences.cn: 她去盥洗室了。
sentences.en: She's gone to the loo.

sentences.cn: 我可以用一下你的厕所吗？
sentences.en: Can I use your loo, please?

sentences.cn: 我问是否可以上厕所。
sentences.en: I asked if I could go to the loo.

sentences.cn: 公厕
sentences.en: ...public loos.

sentences.cn: 应用LOO估算 选择的核函数模型能够较好地退近最佳值.
sentences.en: The kernel function model selected by LOO estimation can approach the best value satisfactorily.

sentences.cn: 有时候,如果他加入一个队伍,他只在吃饭和上厕所的时候才有片刻停息.
sentences.en: Sometimes if he's locked into a group he'll break only to eat and visit the loo.

sentences.cn: 我可以用一下洗手间 吗 ?
sentences.en: Can I use your loo?

sentences.cn: 不过这一回却没有看见有人打“禄牌”.
sentences.en: The loo table , however, did not appear.

sentences.cn: 排在聊天之后的是经常去售货机和厕所.
sentences.en: Next to chatting come frequent visits to the vending machine and the loo.

sentences.cn: 在英式英语中,私人住宅中的厕所称为thelavatory, toilet, WC ( 已陈旧 ) 或loo ( 用于口语 ).
sentences.en: In British English the toilet in private houses is called the lavatory, toilet, WC ( dated ), or loo ( informal )

sentences.cn: 我要上厕所.
sentences.en: I need to go to the loo.

sentences.cn: 那会让我多上厕所, 同样会影响生产力.
sentences.en: That would result in more trips to the loo, which would also encroach on productivity.

sentences.cn: (想去洗手间)我确实需要更多多点大家帮助.
sentences.en: Deputy Garman loo I do require a little more help.

sentences.cn: 同时, 这也为证券投资基金的治理提供了理论支持.
sentences.en: Meanwhile, this offered theory support for administration of the security investment fund loo.

sentences.cn: 采用MBE在Si ( 100 ) 衬底上制备Ag纳米薄膜.
sentences.en: The nanometer Ag film is made by MBE on the surface of Si ( lOO ).

sentences.cn: 尼基: 好. 但我要先去一下洗手间.
sentences.en: Nicky: Okay. But I got to go to loo first.

sentences.cn: (想去洗手间 ) 我确实需要更多一点的帮助.
sentences.en: Deputy Garman : [ On needing to ingest the loo ] I do order a lowercase more help.

sentences.cn: 很可爱的车站.听说绕到背后还有厕所, 很现代很方便.
sentences.en: It is lovely The loo is around the back , featuring all mod cons, I'm told.

sentences.cn: 我自己一会儿喝茶,一会儿喝健怡可乐,一会儿喝水, 每种液体都迫使我要沿着走廊走一趟.
sentences.en: And when you have a lot of liquid, you need to go to the loo often.

sentences.cn: 在太空, 抽水马桶价值不菲.
sentences.en: In space, a loo costs a lot.

sentences.cn: 我不得不冲向卫生间，以免遭到别人的疯狂嘲笑。
sentences.en: I had to rush to the loo to avoid an attack of hysterical giggles.

sentences.cn: 她去盥洗室了。
sentences.en: She's gone to the loo.

sentences.cn: 商店货品齐全，从香烟到再生厕纸应有尽有。
sentences.en: The shop stocks everything from cigarettes to recycled loo paper.
